title: Dangerous Loyalty
description: Where does your loyalty lie?Kendall Waters is a successful defense attorney who moonlights for a money-laundering family in the desert town of Sawtooth, Arizona. She finds herself questioning everything after her client retires and leaves the business to his mysterious nephew, Alvaro.Sparks don’t exactly fly when they meet, as he’s intimidating and standoffish. But Kendall is determined not to let her years of hard work for the family she cares about go to waste, so she accepts the nearly impossible assignment he gives her.As tensions rise, her attraction to Alvaro grows, but he only pushes her away. That is, until one night when everything changes.Alvaro Moreno is only focused on being the best head of the Moreno family business he can be. He’s determined to make his uncle proud and show him that he won’t be like his father. His plan is set, and nothing can deter him.Until he meets Kendall.At first, he can deny his attraction to her. She’s just their lawyer after all, and he has a job to do. But as time passes, his feelings become harder to ignore, eventually boiling over into everything he does. Now, she’s all he can think about. Realizing that he’s put her at risk, he can only hope it’s not too late.Sacrifices are made, choices have consequences, and loyalty can be dangerous.
author: Lillie  Locklyn
